title: 20th anniversary cape

properties.value: The 20th anniversary cape is a reward from the 20th Anniversary event.

content:

The 20th anniversary cape is a reward from the 20th Anniversary event.

This item can be stored in the toy box of a costume room, as part of the 2021: 20th Anniversary outfit set. Ultimate Ironmen will be unable to retrieve individual pieces until the full set is stored.
